text:
I’m noticing that using the hs debug mode is no longer returning the unminified files, it’d be nice if it still did that. Helps for the literal purpose of debugging.

Note I’m specifically referring to CSS here. didn’t check if JS is staying unminified.

The unminified css allows us to use the google chrome inspector changes tab which is great for when you and a co-worker are trading off working in a file
hmm, i just tested a site and it's still un-minifying it for me.
hmm. Might be something specifically happening on this page.
Good to hear.  I just requested Beta access and I'm excited to check it out

We're having a bunch of old sites' custom modules break today. My theory on this is that they're modules using `body` as a field, which is something the design manager allowed at the time they were built several years ago.
Is there any way to fix this without going through all these sites and reentering the content? :confused:
There's hundreds of pages on some of these.

Example: <http://www.blackbox-consulting.com/>
There should be a big banner at the top and some icons in the middle
Hi Ian, do you mind sending me an example of a custom module that broke? Feel free to DM me with the link.
Thank you, I’m taking a look now
